original_title: Ruby and Tom Take a Cake to a Wedding
overview: Ruby has started a business baking cakes from home. At the last minute, she has been tasked with creating the centrepiece cake at a friendâ€™s wedding. Now, along with her aloof partner Tom, she must navigate a broken-down car, dismissive parents, unhelpful friends and other obstacles in order to make it to the wedding on time.
